Stance of Legend.name: Stance of Legend
Stance of Legend.flavor: The forces of destiny provide you with an uncanny awareness of your surroundings, which affects how you hold yourself and how you react to your environment and the actions of others.
Stance of Legend.effect: Effect: You assume the stance of legend. Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws. You can end this stance at any time during your turn as a free action. When you end the stance, you may either end all conditions currently affecting you that a save can end, or regain hit points as if you spent a healing surge.
